prompt: Create a user settings page with a light theme and a creamy white background (#FFFDE7). Feature a profile section at the top with a circular avatar (100x100 pixels) centered above user name 'Jane Smith' and email 'jane.smith@email.com' in a card with a coral border (#FF6F61). Use a single-column layout with three sections: Account ('Edit Profile', 'Change Password', 'Privacy'), Preferences ('Notifications' toggle, 'Dark Mode' toggle, 'Language' with a dropdown arrow), and Support ('Help', 'Contact', 'About'). Each item is a list tile with coral icons and text. Place a full-width coral 'Logout' button at the bottom with rounded corners (12px). Apply 20px padding and 10px spacing, using Material 3 design with a warm, inviting aesthetic.
